name: Tic Tac Toe in Space
description:
CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys for Player 1 (Blue) and WASD for Player 2 (Red)

Press ESC to restart

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made over a 4 day weekend with 3 pizzas and 5 microwave burritos in total. Two spaceships compete in the deadly bloodsport of Tic Tac Toe while trying to avoid horrible death in a black hole.

When the timer at the top of the screen empties, both ships drop their markers at the square they sit over. Old claims are overridden by more recent ones, and two simultaneous claims coexist, functioning for both players.

Game is nowhere near polished, and sound is nonexistent, but i had fun making this game and I hope you have at least a little bit of fun playing it.
